title: Baked Corn
ingredients: 3 cups grated cheese (Monterrey Jack or Mozzarella)
¼ cup bacon drippings (for best result), vegetable oil or butter otherwise
instructions: In a bowl, thoroughly beat the eggs and combine them with the milk.  Place all the other ingredients in a bowl, add the egg mixture, and mix well.  When well mixed pour the corn mixture into a 12 by 14-inch baking pan.
Bake in the oven for 45 to 50 minutes, until the ingredients firm and cake up.
remarks: Serve with your favorite grilled steak and a fresh salad.
source: Matt Martinez’s Culinary Frontier:  A Real Texas Cookbook, by Matt Martinez, Jr., and Steve Pate, published by Doubleday, 1540 Broadway, New York, N.Y. 10036, © 1997 by Matt Martinez, Jr., and Steve Pate.
